<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Ki Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=4061) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 222</row>

**Archetype** [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18)

**Prerequisites**
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900)

</column>

---

You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: [_unblinking flame aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1244) for Unblinking Flame, [_unbreaking wave vapor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1249) for Unbreaking Waves, [_unfolding wind buffet_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1251) for Unfolding Wind, or [_untwisting iron roots_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1255) for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You become an expert in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.

<title level="2">Perfect Ki Expert leads to...</title>
[Perfect Ki Grandmaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=4063)
name: Perfect Ki Expert
